name: psy-ball
description:
an older resurfaced game project.

traverse the maze with qweasd keys (hexagonal control, w is up and s is down and the rest are diagonals). 

see the top of the screen for your current level, you can only step on tiles with equal or less numbers. level up by collecting the hexagons with a dark background.

the worlds are randomly generated. Ctrl+R resets the game.
